title: Synthesis, characterization, crystal structure, and fabrication of photosensitive Schottky device of a binuclear Cu(II)-Salen complex: a DFT investigations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14992-15007
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01846J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dhrubajyoti Majumdar, Bouzid Gassoumi, Arka Dey, Sourav Roy, Sahbi Ayachi, Suman Hazra, Sudipta Dalai
This work explores one centrosymmetric binuclear Cu(II)-Salen complex synthesis, characterization, photosensitive Schottky barrier diode (PSBD) function, and DFT spectrum.
